survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Sustainable Packaging in Food Delivery
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and attitudes towards sustainable packaging in food delivery services. The insights will help businesses improve their packaging solutions to meet environmental and customer expectations.

questions.question_text: How often do you use food delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to gauge frequency of usage. Ensure options cover all possible ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use food delivery services?

questions.question_text: What type of sustainable packaging do you prefer for food delivery?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to identify preferred sustainable packaging types. Ensure clarity in options.

script.question_text: What type of sustainable packaging do you prefer for food delivery?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: How important is sustainable packaging to you when choosing a food delivery service?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to measure importance. Likert scale recommended for clarity.

script.question_text: How important is sustainable packaging to you when choosing a food delivery service?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay extra for food delivery services that use sustainable packaging?
answer_options: Yes, but only a small amount
No, I would not pay extra
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered 'Very important' or 'Somewhat important' in Q3
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to assess willingness to pay. Ensure options are clear and actionable.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to pay extra for food delivery services that use sustainable packaging?
answer_options: Yes, but only a small amount
No, I would not pay extra
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who answered 'Very important' or 'Somewhat important' in Q3

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for sustainable packaging in food delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for sustainable packaging in food delivery services?
